      • ConvolutionDifferentialGeneric

    • Method Detail

      • partialFiniteDifference

        public static ConvolutionBaseGeneric partialFiniteDifference(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                             CoordinateAxis axis,
                                                             int order,
                                                             int skippingStep)
        Allows to apply a finite difference to compute a partial differential along the Z axis. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStepZ. This process is iterated orderZ times. No normalization is performed, and therefore dividing by (2*skippingStepZ)^orderZ should be taken care of later if required.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        axis - The coordinate axis along which to evaluate a partial derivative
        order - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        skippingStep - The skipping step used for finite difference evaluation
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

      • partialFiniteDifferenceCalibrated

        public static ConvolutionBaseGeneric partialFiniteDifferenceCalibrated(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                                       ImageCalibration imageCalibration,
                                                                       CoordinateAxis axis,
                                                                       int order,
                                                                       double realSkippingStep)
        Allows to apply a finite difference to compute a partial differential along the Z axis. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStepZ. This process is iterated orderZ times. No normalization is performed, and therefore dividing by (2*skippingStepZ)^orderZ should be taken care of later if required.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        imageCalibration - Image Calibration metadata (see ImageCore.getImageCalibration()).
        axis - The coordinate axis along which to evaluate a partial derivative
        order - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        realSkippingStep - The skipping step used for finite difference evaluation, considered as a multiple of the calibration's voxel edge's length.
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

      • partialFiniteDifferenceZ

        public static ConvolutionBaseGeneric partialFiniteDifferenceZ(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                              int orderZ,
                                                              int skippingStepZ)
        Allows to apply a finite difference to compute a partial differential along the Z axis. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStepZ. This process is iterated orderZ times. No normalization is performed, and therefore dividing by (2*skippingStepZ)^orderZ should be taken care of later if required.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask, and which is used for both input and output (overwritten). The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        skippingStepZ - The skipping step used for finite difference evaluation
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

      • partialFiniteDifferenceZ

        public static ConvolutionBaseGeneric partialFiniteDifferenceZ(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                              int orderZ,
                                                              int skippingStepZ,
                                                              boolean absoluteValue)
        Allows to apply a finite difference to compute a partial differential along the Z axis. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStepZ. This process is iterated orderZ times. No normalization is performed, and therefore dividing by (2*skippingStepZ)^orderZ should be taken care of later if required.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask, and which is used for both input and output (overwritten). The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        skippingStepZ - The skipping step used for finite difference evaluation
        absoluteValue - If true, the absolute value of the partial difference.
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

        public static ConvolutionBaseGeneric partialFiniteDifferenceX(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,

        Allows to apply a finite difference to compute a partial differential along the X axis. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStepX. This process is iterated orderX times. No normalization is performed, and therefore dividing by (2*skippingStepX)^orderX should be taken care of later if required.

      • finiteDifference

        public static ConvolutionBase finiteDifference(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                               int orderX,
                                               int orderY,
                                               int orderZ,
                                               int skippingStepX,
                                               int skippingStepY,
                                               int skippingStepZ)
        Computes a Partial Differential of arbitrary order in each direction by (iterated) finite differences with skipping steps. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStep. This process is iterated order times for each direction. The results can be normalized according to different policies.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        orderX - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; first coordinate
        orderY - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        skippingStepX - Skipping step in X
        skippingStepY - Skipping step in Y
        skippingStepZ - Skipping step in Z
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

      • applyFiniteDifference

        public static ImageCore applyFiniteDifference(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                              int orderX,
                                              int orderY,
                                              int orderZ,
                                              int skippingStepX,
                                              int skippingStepY,
                                              int skippingStepZ,
                                              ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy normalizationPolicy)
        Computes a Partial Differential of the image by (iterated) finite differences with skipping steps. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStep. This process is iterated order times for each direction. The results can be normalized according to different policies.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        orderX - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; first coordinate
        orderY - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        skippingStepX - Skipping step in X
        skippingStepY - Skipping step in Y
        skippingStepZ - Skipping step in Z
        normalizationPolicy - The policy for normalizing the results.
        Returns:
        The image containing the result with the format corresponding to normalizationPolicy

      • finiteDifferenceCalibrated

        public static ConvolutionBase finiteDifferenceCalibrated(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                         ImageCalibration imageCalibration,
                                                         int orderX,
                                                         int orderY,
                                                         int orderZ,
                                                         double realSkippingStepX,
                                                         double realSkippingStepY,
                                                         double realSkippingStepZ)
        Computes a Partial Differential of the image by (iterated) finite differences with skipping steps. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStep. This process is iterated order times for each direction. The results can be normalized according to different policies. The metadata associated to this image is copied to the metadata of the resulting image. This method does the same as finiteDifference(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric, int, int, int, int, int, int) except the skipping steps are given in (approximately) multiples of the calibration data (Voxels edges lengths in a given length unit) instead of number of voxels.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        imageCalibration - Image Calibration metadata (see ImageCore.getImageCalibration()).
        orderX - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; first coordinate
        orderY - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        realSkippingStepX - Skipping step in X
        realSkippingStepY - Skipping step in Y
        realSkippingStepZ - Skipping step in Z
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.

      • applyFiniteDifferenceCalibrated

        public static ImageCore applyFiniteDifferenceCalibrated(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric imageSignPolicyEmbed,
                                                        ImageCalibration imageCalibration,
                                                        int orderX,
                                                        int orderY,
                                                        int orderZ,
                                                        double realSkippingStepX,
                                                        double realSkippingStepY,
                                                        double realSkippingStepZ,
                                                        ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy normalizationPolicy)
        Computes a Partial Differential of the image by (iterated) finite differences with skipping steps. A centered symmetric difference is computed between point distant from 2*skippingStep. This process is iterated order times for each direction. The results can be normalized according to different policies. The metadata associated to this image is copied to the metadata of the resulting image. This method does the same as applyFiniteDifference(ImageSignPolicyEmbedGeneric, int, int, int, int, int, int, ConvolutionNormalizationPolicy) except the skipping steps are given in (approximately) multiples of the calibration data (Voxels edges lengths in a given length unit) instead of number of voxels.
        Parameters:
        imageSignPolicyEmbed - An original image on which to apply the mask. The image must allow values to be added AND subtracted without overflow. Use ImageSignPolicyEmbed.getImageEmbedding(boolean, int) if necessary.
        imageCalibration - Image Calibration metadata (see ImageCore.getImageCalibration()).
        orderX - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; first coordinate
        orderY - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        orderZ - cardinality of the support of the smoothing mask; second coordinate
        realSkippingStepX - Skipping step in X
        realSkippingStepY - Skipping step in Y
        realSkippingStepZ - Skipping step in Z
        normalizationPolicy - The policy for normalizing the results.
        Returns:
        The Convolution Kernel implementing the ConvolutionBaseGeneric.applyMask() method allowing to apply a finite difference.
